package.name: gcc
package.patch:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}
case $(uname -m) in x86_64) sed -e '/m64=/s/lib64/lib/' \ -i.orig gcc/config/i386/t-linux64 ;; esac
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-build SED=sed export SED ../${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/configure --prefix=/usr \ --enable-languages=c,c++ \ --disable-multilib \ --disable-bootstrap \ --with-system-zlib make -j ` grep -c processor /proc/cpuinfo `
package.install:
cd ${PKGNAME}-build make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/lib ln -sfv ../usr/bin/cpp ${TGTDIR}/lib ln -sfv gcc ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/cc
install -v -dm755 /usr/lib/bfd-plugins ln -sfv ../../libexec/gcc/$(gcc -dumpmachine)/${PKGVERSION}/liblto_plugin.so /usr/lib/bfd-plugins/
echo '-=> compiling and checking dummy' echo 'main(){}' > dummy.c ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/cc dummy.c -v -Wl,--verbose &> dummy.log readelf -l a.out | grep ': /lib' echo '-=> grepping through dummy.log' grep -o '/usr/lib.*/crt[1in].*succeeded' dummy.log echo '-=> grepping headers in dummy.log' grep -B4 '^ /usr/include' dummy.log echo '-=> grepping linker in dummy.log' grep 'SEARCH.*/usr/lib' dummy.log |sed 's|; |\n|g' echo '-=> grepping libc in dummy.log' grep "/lib.*/libc.so.6 " dummy.log echo '-=> grepping ld in dummy.log' grep found dummy.log
